review: I have been a prime member for over twelve years.  For the first time EVER I am compelled to write a short and sweet review of the Amazon Fire TV.  In short, I LOVE IT!  BEST "TOY" EVER. The amount of joy this little box is giving to me by enabling me to use my big screen TV to view all of the content available through Amazon Prime for Free is incredible.  The best $99 I have spent in I don't remember when.  My sister who does not understand technology is actually considering buying a Kindle Fire and the Amazon Fire TV box so that she, too, can get all the TV joy imaginable.  There are not enough days in the month, the years and time I have left on this planet to view everything I want to see.  I am saddened to think of and to say this but it's true.  LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS as much as my Kindle Fire because of its capability to project my kindle content and  such an immense quantity of free content onto my big screen T.V.  I am one happy customer
author: amazonfan
